name: The Life Of Harmon Rabb, JR. Quiz | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: Who did Harm make this statement about, "Anyone who has ever been in love with ____ either ends up dead or wishes they were"?
questions.explanation:
Mac.

	Harm made this statement to Sturgis just before running into Mac in the elevator.

questions.text: Has Harm ever delivered a baby?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Harm never delivered the woman's baby in "Code Blue" because his roommate, Chief Walter Hume, delivered the baby at the end of the show. The Admiral delivered Harriet's baby in "Yeah, Baby" even though Harm held her hand and breathed with Harriet through most of her labor.

questions.text: In "Smoked", Harm and Keeter talked about a woman they both dated. The woman was mentioned again in "The Prisoner". What was the woman's occupation?
questions.explanation:
Stewardess.

	Harm and Keeter talked about Maria Helena Carmelita Margarita Moreno Gutierrez in "Smoked", however her occupation wasn't mentioned until "The Prisoner" by Commander Allison Krennick.

October 25, 1963.

	Harm states gives his name, rank, and serial number as well as his birthday to a Chinese interrogator who is holding him prisoner in "The Prisoner".

questions.text: Harm thinks of Mac as a sister.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In "Washington Holiday", Harm told Mac, while they were dancing, that he doesn't think of her as a sister.

questions.text: What was the name of Harm's bi-plane?
questions.explanation:
Sarah.

	Harm named his bi-plane after his grandmother who lives in Pennsylvania. In "Dangerous Games", the Admiral asked Harm if he named the plane after Mac.

questions.text: In what season did Harm stop smoking cigars?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	Commander Coulter (Trisha Yearwood) gave Harm a chocolate cigar at the end of "The Return of Jimmy Blackhorse" after he told her that he stopped smoking earlier in the episode.

questions.text: After Harm was fired from JAG, what agency did he join?
questions.explanation:
CIA.

	Harm was fired in "Shifting Sands" and hired by Deputy Director Kershaw of the CIA. When he was fired in "Back In The Saddle", he thought Webb had something to do with it.

questions.text: How old was Harm when he went to Vietnam to look for his father who was MIA?
questions.explanation:
16.

	Harm was sixteen when he went to look for his dad. A Marine nicknamed Stryker helped him look for her. Harm fell in love with a Vietnamese girl named Jim who was killed while crossing border patrol.

questions.text: What was the first song Harm sang on "JAG"?
questions.correct: Have I Told You Lately That I Love You
options: What Becomes Of The Broken Hearted?
questions.explanation:
Have I Told You Lately That I Love You.

	Harm  sang it to Annie and Josh in "Someone To Watch Over Annie". Harm was in a group that sang the other three songs mentioned.

questions.text: Did Harm find out what happened to his father?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Harm and Mac went to Russia together to look for Harm SR. in "To Russia With Love". Harm found out in "Gypsy Eyes" that his father had been buried somewhere in the mountains after he was shot and killed.

questions.text: Before Harm ejected over the Atlantic in "Adrift", why was he trying to get home?
questions.explanation:
Mac's wedding.

	After talking to Skates, Harm realized he needed to be at Mac's wedding so they both took off the from the SeaHawk for home. On the way, they encountered a storm, had trouble with the plane, and had to eject over the Atlantic.

questions.text: According to Harm in "Code Blue", how many miles does he run?
questions.explanation:
10.

	Harm was jogging in the park when he and Mac ran into each other. The race that happened afterward led to Harm being hit by a car. He  injured his leg, but, unfortunately, ended up involved in a hostage situation.

questions.text: In "Dream Team", where was Harm's new billet located?
questions.explanation:
London.

	General Cresswell handed out Mac and Harm's new billet at the end of "Dream Team". When he handed Harm his new orders, he said he hoped Harm liked Yorkshire pudding.

Yes.

	Harm proposed in his apartment in the series finale, "Fair Winds and Following Seas". The series concluded before viewers saw where the couple would be living: San Diego or London.
